name: FEDERATION FRANCAISE DE LA PARFUMERIE SELECTIVE
membership: The FFPS is a member of the Fédération Européenne des Parfumeurs Détaillants (FEPD)
goal: The Fédération Française de la Parfumerie Sélective (FFPS) represents and supports all the selective distributors of perfumes and cosmetics in France, such as Sephora, Nocibé Marrionaud, Beauty Success, notably alongside public authorities. The FFPS intervenes in connection with regulation, competition, employment law issues in France and Europe, promotes the image of the profession to stakeholders, monitors and analyze market evolutions in order to improve the industry’s logistics with an eco-friendly policy. The FFPS also created its own traning organisation, the Groupement Professionnel de la Formation en Parfumerie Sélective (the GPFPS) whose current purpose is to provide a trade certification for beauty and selective perfumery advisors. The FFPS is a member of the Fédération Européenne des Parfumeurs Détaillants (FEPD)
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Trade
euInitiatives:
Review of the Vertical Block Exemption Regulation
